fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Each night, you can use one ability from every role with a post number that is a power of two. Every restriction on those abilities still applies.
(Post 16) A random town role will be rolled at the beginning of the game, and using Post 16’s ability will count as using that role’s ability.
(Post 32) This role does not apply.
(Post 64) If there are no vampires in the game, this role allows you a 1 use Basic Attack.
